text: The ACH retry engine must implement a structured retry mechanism for failed debit transactions , adhering to a maximum of three retry attempts per failure , utilizing exponential backoff beginning with a 4 - hour delay .
utilizing exponential backoff beginning with a 4 - hour delay
Retries must be disabled for any account marked with the risk_tier field set to "high".
A dedicated retry window is enforced over weekends , specifically from Saturday 06:00 UTC to Sunday 22:00 UTC , during which retries may be scheduled and executed .

For each failed retry attempt, the engine must POST a failure notification within two minutes to https://ops.webhook.company/retry_failed, ensuring the JSON payload includes the keys txnId, attempt, and reason.

The ach_retry_weekend feature must be controlled via a feature flag , defaulting to OFF in production environments , and may only be enabled upon formal QA approval and sign - off to ensure stability and compliance with operational policies .
